ai-tika-abh07t11:71_0: The six elements of existence are expanded on the basis of existence, (and) the consciousness element. Their element of existence is related to the three world elements, expanded on consciousness, not dependent on the four elements, and many kinds of existence.
ai-tika-abh07t11:72_1: And for the sake of sensual pleasures, for the sake of men, they live in dependence on sensual pleasures, for the enlightenment of the fine-material sphere.
